en.introduction: AgentScope Studio is a web-based platform for monitoring, managing and developing multi-agent applications in AgentScope! Feel free to explore the platform and its features.
en.start: Start to explore AgentScope Studio with
en.intro-dashboard: Monitor and manage your AgentScope running instances in a Web-based interface
en.intro-workstation: Develop your multi-agent applications by dragging

zh.introduction: AgentScope Studio是用于监控、管理和开发多智能体应用程序的Web平台！欢迎随意探索AgentScope Studio！
zh.intro-dashboard: 在Web界面中监控和管理您的AgentScope应用运行实例
zh.intro-workstation: 通过拖拽方式开发您的多智能体应用程序
